## IOperationRunnerContext interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Information passed to the executing `IOperationRunner`

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IOperationRunnerContext 
```

</th><th>

[abortSignal](./operation-graph.ioperationrunnercontext.abortsignal.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

AbortSignal


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** An abort signal for the overarching execution. Runners should do their best to gracefully abort as soon as possible if the signal is aborted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isFirstRun](./operation-graph.ioperationrunnercontext.isfirstrun.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** If this is the first time this operation has been executed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[requestRun?](./operation-graph.ioperationrunnercontext.requestrun.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

(detail?: string) =&gt; void


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ A callback to the overarching orchestrator to request that the operation be invoked again. Used in watch mode to signal that inputs have changed.


</td></tr>
